stockmarket.model

Interface VirtualGamble

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    VirtualGambleImpl

    public interface VirtualGamble
    This interface represents a virtual gamble which that helps users who are new to investing to learn about how money could grow. It will allow the user to create investment portfolios, try out buying and selling of stock, and various investment strategies to see how they can grow (or shrink) their money with time.

        void createPortfolio(java.lang.String portfolioID)
              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Method to create new Portfolio which is a combination of one or more shares of different companies.
        Parameters:
        portfolioID - unique identity of a portfolio like retirement, collegeSavings etc
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if portfolio with given ID already exists

      • buyShare

        void buyShare(java.lang.String portfolioID,
              java.lang.String company,
              double amount,
              java.lang.String date,
              double commission)
       throws java.util.NoSuchElementException,
              java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
              java.io.IOException
        Method to buy shares of some stock in a portfolio worth a certain amount at a certain date.It is assumed that stock is purchased at lowest price of share on a particular day.
        Parameters:
        portfolioID - unique ID of portfolio in which share is to be added
        company - ticker symbol of the company for which share is to be added
        amount - amount of the share to be bought
        date - date on which share is to be bought
        commission - commission for this transaction
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - thrown when the given Portfolio ID does not exist
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - thrown when stock is not available at given date or amount is negative or format of date is invalid.
        java.io.IOException

      • getTotalCostBasis

        double getTotalCostBasis(java.lang.String portfolioID)
                  throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Method to get the total cost basis of all the shares for a particular portfolio on a certain date.
        Parameters:
        portfolioID - unique ID of portfolio for which total cost basis is to be calculated
        Returns:
        the total cost basis of portfolio on the given date rounded to two decimal places
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the portfolioID does not exist or the number of available shares is less than required

                       throws java.text.ParseException,
                              java.io.IOException
        Method to apply DollarCostAveraging Technique to portfolio.
        Parameters:
        portfolioID - unique ID of portfolio
        startDate - date to start investment
        endDate - date to end investment
        amount - amount to be invested for each cycle
        period - period to repeat investment
        weights - weights for investment
        commission - commission for this investment
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException
        java.io.IOException

        strategyName - name with which the strategy is to be saved
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if file read or write operation fails

               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

        Parameters:
        strategyName - name of the strategy to be retrieved
        portfolioID - unique ID of portfolio on which this strategy is to be applied
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - thrown if portfolio does not exist
